channel.title: Jane's Addiction on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jane's Addiction on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jane’s Addiction Members File $10 Million Lawsuit Against Perry Farrell Over 2024 Stage Altercation
item.description: “History will remember the band as suffering a swift and painful death at the hands of Farrell’s unprovoked anger and complete lack of self-control,” the suit said.
